title: Coffee shops battle at Brewdown
text:
Coffee shops battle at Brewdown Donna Isbell Walker , diwalker@greenvillenews.com 1:04 p.m. EDT October 19, 2015 Seven coffeeshops will compete in the Brewdown Oct. 22 in Travelers Rest. (Photo: File) 3 CONNECT 6 TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
Coffee lovers often have some very specific criteria for what makes for a great cup of coffee. 
This week, they can cast their hyper-caffeinated votes for the best java in the Upstate at the Brewdown competition in Travelers Rest. 
Seven coffee shops will participate, including last year's champs Tandem, and fans can sample each barista's best. The winner receives bragging rights and the title of Best in Brew. 
Also competing will be BEX Coffee, Methodical Coffee, the Village Grind, Moe Joe's, the Forest Coffeehouse, and the Exchange. 
The event is part of Travelers Rest's Harvest Market, and it goes on from 6 to 8 p.m. Thursday at Trailblazer Park. The cost is $8 to sample each brew and cast a vote. 
Visit www.travelersrestfarmersmarket.com for more info. Read or Share this story: http://grnol.co/1LGuhwx MORE STORIES
